original_text: So now I ask this: ‘When Israel's people failed to accept Jesus as God's Messiah, did they make themselves separate from God for ever?’ No, certainly that is not true! Because of their mistake, God is now saving Gentiles. God is doing that so that Israel's people would become jealous. So now I ask this: ‘When Israel's people failed to accept Jesus as God's Messiah, did they make themselves separate from God for ever?’ No, certainly that is not true! Because of their mistake, God is now saving Gentiles. God is doing that so that Israel's people would become jealous.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 말하노니 그들이 넘어지기까지 실족하였느냐 그럴 수 없느니라 그들이 넘어짐으로 구원이 이방인에게 이르러 이스라엘로 시기나게 함이니라

sentences.original_text: When Israel's people failed to accept Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 예수를 받아들이지 못했을 때

sentences.original_text: did they make themselves separate from God
No, certainly that is not true!
so that Israel's people would become jealous.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘 백성이 질투하게 되기 위함입니다.
